thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: Deborah Rowell
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Deborah Rowell

author: Deborah Rowell
title: Deborah Rowell
text: We've been with Constant Contact for many years, and are happy with how it works for the most part. One problem we've had is that the code behind the scenes sometimes does quirky things. I'm a website designer, so I understand most of what is going on with the code, and can usually fix it. But doing copy and paste even within an email is difficult - it loses the formatting that I want and has to be done over. Customer service is always knowledgeable and helpful. The Chat feature is a great time saver. So if that problem with copy and paste can be corrected, I'd be very happy.
